RelatedSentence: Parts of the countries saw as much rain fall in 40 hours as they normally get in three months , officials said .

Authorities said over 37 people have died as a result of the flooding .

Soldiers , police and volunteers battled to protect power plants in Serbia from rising flood waters on Sunday , May 18 as the death toll from the Balkan region 's worst rainfall in more than a century rose to at least 37 .
